Interface TraceableJsonTokenizer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonTokenizer
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface TraceableJsonTokenizer
extends JsonTokenizer

        hasMore, next, peek

    • Method Detail

      • enableTracing

        void enableTracing()
        Enable "tracing". Tracing, at this point, means that we simply keep the char tail buffer so that when an error occurs we can see the "exception context".

      • disableTracing

        void disableTracing()
        Disable "tracing".

      • isTracingEnabled

        boolean isTracingEnabled()
        Returns true if "tracing" is enabled.
        Returns:
        whether "tracing" is enabled or not.

      • tailCharsAsString

        String tailCharsAsString(int length)
        Parameters:
        length - Max length of the String/char[] to be returned from the tail buffer.
        Returns:
        the tail part of the tail character buffer as a string.

      • tailCharStream

        char[] tailCharStream(int length)

      • peekCharsAsString

        String peekCharsAsString(int length)
        Parameters:
        length - Max length of the String/char[] to be peeked.
        Returns:
        the character array in the stream as a string.

      • peekCharStream

        char[] peekCharStream(int length)
